course_name: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
description: Focuses on computation, algorithms, and software development.
job_applicability: High demand in tech, finance, and entertainment sectors.
future_trends: AI, cybersecurity, and data science are rapidly growing fields.
automation_risk: Low. Requires creativity and complex problem-solving.

course_name: Bachelor of Medicine and Bachelor of Surgery
description: Trains students to become doctors and medical practitioners.
job_applicability: Very high. Essential service with a constant need for qualified professionals.
future_trends: Telemedicine and personalized medicine are key future trends.
automation_risk: Very Low. Requires deep human interaction and complex diagnosis.

description: Provides a foundation in legal principles, practice, and theory.
job_applicability: Stable. Opportunities in corporate law, public service, and private practice.
future_trends: Legal tech and specialization in areas like data privacy are growing.
automation_risk: Medium. Research and document review can be automated, but courtroom and client-facing work requires human skills.

description: Covers core business functions like management, finance, and marketing.
job_applicability: High. Graduates are needed across all industries.
future_trends: Digital marketing, e-commerce, and sustainable business practices are major trends.
automation_risk: Medium. Data analysis and routine administrative tasks can be automated, but strategic leadership remains crucial.

description: Focuses on the practical application of electricity, electronics, and electromagnetism.
job_applicability: Very High. Strong demand in construction, manufacturing, and renewable energy sectors.
future_trends: Green energy, smart grids, and IoT are driving future growth.
automation_risk: Low. Requires hands-on work and on-site problem-solving.
